article_title: Disruptive Companies And Funders Meet To Change Health Delivery

article_metadata.description: Two of the most significant pieces of legislation in decades, the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (ACA) and the Jumpstart Our Business Startups (JOBS) Act, are poised to transform the entire spectrum of health care. The ACA regulates everything from health insurance requirements to tax collection. The JOBS Act [...]
article_metadata.author: Nicole Fisher
